p: The two samples of MAH 104 in exponential and stationary growth phases showed a relatively similar fractionation pattern on Coomassie Brilliant Blue stained SDS-PAGE gels with a characteristic variation in the intensity of some bands ( Figure 1). For better resolution, we utilized two-dimensional electrophoresis (2-DE) with isoelectric focusing of isoelectric non-linear (pI 3â€“10) as the first dimension. Duplicate 2-DE images of silver-stained gels for proteins extracted from exponential and stationary growth phases are shown in Figure 2. The proteome patterns generated from each phase represent well-resolved protein spots.
